description:
Are you a budding entrepreneur interested in starting a business in the state of Georgia?

The course provides practical knowledge and downloadable documents to allow you to quickly establish either a traditional For-Profit Corporation (C-Corp) or a Sub-Chapter S Corporation (aka a Small Business Corporation or S-Corp) in Georgia.

This course covers the steps necessary to help you fast-track your incorporation process!

Plus how to...

  • Establish a Corporate Records Book;
  • File for your Federal Employer Identification Number;
  • Establish your Electronic Federal Tax Payment System (EFTPS) pin to pay your FICA/FUTA;
  • File for your county Occupational Tax Certificate / Business License in one of Georgia's 159 counties
  • Submit your initial Annual Registration with the Georgia Secretary of State;
  • Obtain your Georgia Department of Labor (GDOL) Account Number for Georgia Unemployment Insurance;
  • Establish a Georgia Department of Labor Internet password - To File & Pay Electronically
  • File a New Hire Report with the Georgia Department of Labor ; and
  • Register with the Georgia Department of Revenue (GDOR) for Georgia Withholding Tax

BONUS:

  • Sample Articles of Incorporation;
  • Sample Corporate Bylaws;
  • Sample Minutes and Waiver of Notice for the 1st Meeting of Incorporators;
  • Sample Minutes and Waiver of Notice for the Organizational Meeting of Directors; and
  • Sample Minutes and Waiver of Notice for a Special Meeting of Shareholders to Elect S-Corp Status with the IRS.
title: Thinking of Starting a Business in the State of Georgia?
